Quote 1.quote_text: The heart of man is very much like the sea, it has its storms, it has its tides and in its depths it has its pearls too

Quote 2.quote_text: Just like moons and suns, with certainty of tides, just like hopes springing high, still I'll rise

Quote 3.quote_text: At the beach, life is different. Time doesn't move hour to hour but mood to moment. We live by the currents, plan by the tides, and follow the sun

Quote 4.quote_text: Just because the tide is out, doesn't mean there is less water in the ocean

Quote 5.quote_text: There's no point in fighting the tide. It ebbs. It flows. You ride it

Quote 6.quote_text: Never give up because you never know what the tide will bring in the next day

Quote 7.quote_text: The tides are in our veins

Quote 8.quote_text: Tides do what tides do - they turn

Quote 9.quote_text: A rising tide lifts all boats

Quote 10.quote_text: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked
